entities.description: Misallocation of capital resulting from inadequate climate risk information

entities.description: Lack of information on financial implications of climate-related aspects of organizations

entities.label: Disclosure Inconsistency
entities.description: Inconsistencies in disclosure practices, lack of context, use of boilerplate, and non-comparable reporting

entities.label: Technology Risk
entities.description: Risk from technological improvements or innovations that support the transition to a lower-carbon, energy-efficient economic system

entities.label: Market Risk
entities.description: Risk from shifts in supply and demand for certain commodities, products, and services as climate-related risks and opportunities are taken into account

entities.label: Reputation Risk
entities.description: Risk tied to changing customer or community perceptions of an organization's contribution to or detraction from the transition to a lower-carbon economy

entities.label: Physical Risk
entities.description: Physical risks resulting from climate change that can be event driven (acute) or longer-term shifts (chronic) in climate patterns

entities.label: Acute Physical Risk
entities.description: Event-driven physical risks including increased severity of extreme weather events such as cyclones, hurricanes, or floods

entities.label: Chronic Physical Risk
entities.description: Longer-term shifts in climate patterns that may cause sea level rise or chronic heat waves

entities.label: Resource Efficiency
entities.description: Opportunity to reduce operating costs by improving efficiency across production, distribution, buildings, machinery, and transport
